name: The Circle (Baxter Dulieu)
description:
IMPORTANT: The premise of this game and credit in it's entirety goes to DaniDev

This project was merely an experiment to further develop my Unity skills, hence why it is very closely based off of a game made by the Youtuber known as Dani. This project was undertaken in the first two weeks of my second semester in 2021 and was mainly used to develop my skills in areas such as:

  • Post Processing
  • UI
  • General Programming
  • Movement

Although based off of Dani's original project all code and assets (aside from font) were created and implemented by me. Once again my main intention with this project was to  simply see if I could closely replicate another games features using my own knowledge and is therefore a much more simplified iteration.

Dani's Project;
